Title: RHBA-2019:2044: gnome bug fix and enhancement update (None)
Description:
GNOME is the default desktop environment of Red Hat Enterprise Linux.

For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.7 Release Notes linked from the References section.

Users of gnome are advised to upgrade to these updated packages.

Bugzillas.Title: Notification icon disappearing when 'Blink on new messages' enabled
pidgin SASL support is broken (can't connect to FreeNode IRC)
gkbd-keyboard-display segfault with wrong layout
Switching users in GNOME session is starting new X servers for the user, and a user logout is making it unusable.
gnome-shell-extension-tool gives an error when trying to run it in a terminal
Rebase to 0.19.2
possible memory leak in Gnome
System boots to blank screen when Xinerama enabled with nvidia/nouveau driver
[RHEL 7.5] mutter ignores multi-monitor layout defined in xorg.conf
[RFE] mass-deployable/homogenized display configuration
(nautilus:10443): GLib-GIO-CRITICAL
Gnome-shell outputs error messages with GUI Login on the server which uses NetworkManager and bonding
gnome-settings-daemon account plugin polling accountsservice in a continous loop
nautilus / brasero-nautilus dependency may lead to loss of user data
[abrt] [faf] gnome-session: raise(): /usr/libexec/gnome-session-check-accelerated-gles-helper killed by 5
Mutter Causing Odd/Bad Button Mapping Behavior on Wacom Tablets
mutter sometimes fails to unblank screen when unlocked by a user switch
RFE: Provide a supported method for disabling Gnome screen shield
Xorg listening on port 6000 by default in 7.6
release desktop-file-utils-0.23-8 for RHEL7
Rebuild against new LibRaw soname
pango-1.42.4-1.el7.x86_64 references a symbol that doesn't exist in base glib2
gnome-boxes should rather promote RHEL and Fedora
Time-delayed automatic login doesn't work when disabling user list in GDM
Mouse left click stops working under certain condition
Allow multiple XDMCP sessions in parallel from the same user account
Application windows and popups are hidden from view when dragged below tray menu with gnome classic
pango_fc_font_key_get_variations(key) causing crash when key is null
Cannot open a GUI session on zVM guest
double password asterisks and boot log messages in the "details" theme
Doesn't show any documents when started through search provider
XDMCP remote session cannot unlock screen
possible memory leak in Gnome
Welcome page uses GNOME logo rather than Red Hat logo
gnome-boxes does not show RHEL-8 logo in Source Selection
Fix unresponsive-app dialog blocking other windows
bump version for glib2
